entities.name: nick
entities.description: Nick is a person who is being teased by Ron and Hermione. He is described as someone who is used to students making fun of him, but he takes offense when Ron makes a joke about his death.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a person who tries to defend Nick from Ron's teasing. She throws a furious look at Ron and tells him that he wasn't really laughing at Nick.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is a person who teases Nick about his death, but claims he was just asking a simple question. He makes a joke that doesn't seem to be funny to Nick and gets into an argument with Hermione.

entities.name: colin creevey
entities.description: Colin Creevey is a person who sits at the same table as Nick. He is mentioned as someone who is sitting next to Nick after he gets up and leaves.

entities.name: dennis creevey
entities.description: Dennis Creevey is a person who sits at the same table as Nick. He is mentioned as someone who is sitting next to Colin after Nick gets up and leaves.

relationships.description: Ron teases Nick about his death, making a joke that doesn't seem to be funny to Nick. This is described as Ron 'poking fu n at my death'.
Hermione tries to defend Nick from Ron's teasing, telling him that he wasn't really laughing at Nick.
After getting up and leaving the table, Nick comes to rest between Colin and Dennis Creevey.
